article.title: Cortana to Research and Develop Sensors for Naval Aviation
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Cortana Corporation, Falls Church, Virginia, is being awarded a $7,275,000 contract modification to a previously for the research and development of sensors and systems in support of the Advanced Sensor Application Program and the Remote Environmental Sensor Program. Sensors and systems support a variety of naval aviation missions, including air-undersea warfare, defense suppression, electronic attack, naval warfare and amphibious, strike and anti-surface warfare. The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
